name: Vernon's Legacy
description: Vernon's Legacy is an horror adventure with an enigmatic story that takes place nearly a century ago. You are playing as Robert, the new owner of Dunkenhof manor.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64 bit Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 1GB / Radeon R7 250X 1GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64 bit Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 3 GHz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or equal AMD Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
